长须鲸（rorqual）长须鲸有背鳍，在喉部皮肤处有长长的纵向的槽。
图文长须鲸(rorqual) 长须鲸有背鳍,在喉部皮肤处有长长的纵向的槽。这种鲸大部分因为... 与所有须鲸一样,雌性蓝鲸比雄性个头大。 蓝鲸吃什么才变得这么大的? 早餐是.

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 19th cent.: via French from Norwegian røyrkval, from Old Norse reythr, the specific name, + hvalr 'whale'

means.word_mean: 1. any of several baleen whales of the family Balaenopteridae having longitudinal grooves on the throat and a small pointed dorsal fin
